event_name: Spring 2025 GRASP SFI: Ke Li, Simon Fraser University, “The Devil Is in the Gaps: How (Not) To Interpolate Between Discrete Points”
description: What do diffusion models/flow matching, Gaussian splatting and efficient transformer architectures have in common? Under the hood, they all turn a discrete set of points into a function defined everywhere. In the case of diffusion models/flow matching
